name: Notti Sdn Bhd
description: Operator of an online store intended to change the pet industry in Malaysia. The company offers slow-baked, grain-free kibbles made with protein content and human-grade fresh meat designed to support pet health and wellness, enabling owners to provide healthy food option to their pets.
one_liner: Operator of an online store intended to change the pet industry in Malaysia. The company offers slow-baked, grain-free kibbles made with protein content and human-grade fresh meat designed to support pet health and wellness, enabling owners to provide healthy food option to their pets.
